text:
@Alyssa_Milano So you have abandoned all leftwing propaganda?
Science: COVID-19 is a glorified head cold, much less dangerous than influenza.
Facts: 'rat policies failed.
Truth: 'rat leaders want to install feudalism, not socialism, themselves as overlords, relegating the rest of us to serfdom.
